query.description: This is used to Find All SalesOrg's
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from SalesOrg o
select object(o) from Currency o
select object(o) from Division o
select object(o) from DstrChannel o
select object(o) from BillingType o
select object(o) from BillingFrequency o
select object(o) from PaymentTerm o
select object(o) from BillingBlock o
select object(o) from Customer o where o.proposalId = ?1 order by o.planEndDate
select object(o) from Customer o where o.customerId = (select max(a.customerId) from Customer a)
select object(o) from Customer o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.customerListNo = ?2
select object(o) from Customer o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.sapCustomerNo = ?2
select object(o) from Customer o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.sapCustomerNo = ?2 and o.planStartDate = ?3 and o.planEndDate = ?4
select object(o) from Customer o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.planStartDate = ?2 and o.planEndDate = ?3
select object(o) from DM o where o.dmNo=?1 and o.proposalId=?2 and o.customerId=?3
select object(o) from DM o where o.customerId = ?1 and o.proposalId = ?2 order by o.planEndDate
select object(o) from DM o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from DM o where o.dmId = (select max(a.dmId) from DM a)
select object(o) from SWO o where o.equipmentNo=?1 and o.proposalId=?2
select object(o) from SWO o where o.dmId = ?1 and o.customerId = ?2 and o.proposalId = ?3
select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from SWO o where o.swoId = (select max(a.swoId) from SWO a)

query.description: finds all SVC License that are present for a Proposal
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.itemCategory = ?2
select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.customerId = ?2

query.description: This method finds the max sequence no
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from SWO o where o.sequenceNo= (select max(a.sequenceNo) from SWO a where a.salesDocNo=?1 and a.swoItemNo=?2 and a.proposalId=?3) and o.salesDocNo=?1 and o.swoItemNo=?2 and o.proposalId=?3
select object(o) from SWO o where o.salesDocNo =?1 and o.proposalId=?2
select object(o) from SWO o where o.bumpInd= (select max(a.bumpInd) from SWO a where a.salesDocNo=?1 and a.swoItemNo=?2 and a.proposalId=?3) and o.salesDocNo=?1 and o.swoItemNo=?2 and o.proposalId=?3
select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.sandsIndicator = ?2
select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.swoExtContrNo is null
select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.exclusionId = 'Y'
select object(o) from SWO o where o.salesDocNo =?1 and o.proposalId=?2 and o.swoItemNo=?3
select object(o) from SWO o where o.equipmentNo = ?1 and o.salesDocNo = ?2 and o.proposalId = ?3
select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.swoNo = ?2 and o.serialNo = ?3
select object(o) from SWO o where o.equipmentNo=?1 and o.proposalId=?2 and o.customerId=?3 and o.dmId=?4
select object(o) from SWO o where o.salesDocNo =?1 and o.proposalId=?2 and o.swoItemNo=?3 and o.customerId=?4 and o.dmId=?5
select object(o) from SWO o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.swoNo = ?2 and o.salesDocNo = ?3 and o.swoItemNo = ?4
select object(o) from EE o where o.swoId = ?1 and o.dmId = ?2 and o.customerId = ?3 and o.proposalId = ?4
select object(o) from EE o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from EE o where o.eeId = (select max(a.eeId) from EE a)
select object(o) from EE o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.eeNo = ?2 and o.salesDocNo = ?3 and o.eeItemNo = ?4 and o.swoItemNo = ?5
select object(o) from Price o where o.eeId = ?1 and o.swoId = ?2 and o.dmId = ?3 and o.customerId = ?4 and o.proposalId = ?5 order by o.billPlanStartDate
select object(o) from Price o where o.priceId = (select max(a.priceId) from Price a)
select object(o) from HistoryCustomer o where o.customerId = (select max(a.customerId) from HistoryCustomer a)
select object(o) from HistoryDM o where o.dmId = (select max(a.dmId) from HistoryDM a)
select object(o) from VarianceDM o where o.dmId = (select max(a.dmId) from VarianceDM a)
select object(o) from VarianceDM o where o.dmNo=?1 and o.proposalId=?2 and o.customerId=?3
select object(o) from VarianceDM o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from VarianceDM o where o.customerId = ?2 and o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from HistorySWO o where o.swoId = (select max(a.swoId) from HistorySWO a)
select object(o) from VarianceSWO o where o.swoId = (select max(a.swoId) from VarianceSWO a)
select object(o) from VarianceSWO o where o.equipmentNo=?1 and o.proposalId=?2
select object(o) from VarianceSWO o where o.dmId = ?1 and o.customerId = ?2 and o.proposalId = ?3
select object(o) from HistoryEE o where o.eeId = (select max(a.eeId) from HistoryEE a)
select object(o) from VarianceEE o where o.eeId = (select max(a.eeId) from VarianceEE a)
select object(o) from VarianceEE o where o.swoId = ?1 and o.dmId = ?2 and o.customerId = ?3 and o.proposalId = ?4
select object(o) from VariancePrice o where o.priceId = (select max(a.priceId) from VariancePrice a)

select object(o) from VariancePrice o where o.eeId = ?1 and o.swoId = ?2 and o.dmId = ?3 and o.customerId = ?4 and o.proposalId = ?5 and o.billPlanStartDate = (select max(a.billPlanStartDate) from VariancePrice a where a.eeId = ?1 and a.swoId = ?2 and a.dmId = ?3 and a.customerId = ?4 and a.proposalId = ?5)

select object(o) from VariancePrice o where o.eeId = ?1 and o.swoId = ?2 and o.dmId = ?3 and o.customerId = ?4 and o.proposalId = ?5 and o.billPlanStartDate = (select max(a.billPlanStartDate) from VariancePrice a where a.eeId = ?1 and a.swoId = ?2 and a.dmId = ?3 and a.customerId = ?4 and a.proposalId = ?5 and a.indicator not in ('D','S'))
select object(o) from OfferingType o
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.proposalName = ?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.approvedBy=?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.lockedBy=?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.createdBy=?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.approvedBy=?1 and o.statusCode in ('PA','EA','AA','VA')

query.description: This will find the proposals which are locked by user in a particular group
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from Proposal o where o.lockedBy=?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.proposalId = (select max(a.proposalId) from Proposal a)
select object(o) from Proposal o where (o.approvedBy=?1 and o.statusCode in ('PA','EA','AA','VA')) or o.createdBy=?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.approvedBy=?1 and o.statusCode in ('PA','EA','AA','VA')
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.createdBy=?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.contrNo = ?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.tpContractNo = ?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.createdBy = ?1 and o.contractStartDate >= ?2 and o.contractEndDate <= ?3
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.createdBy = ?1 and o.groupName =?2 and o.contrClsDate <= ?3 and o.contrClsDate >= ?4
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.contrNo = ?1 or o.extContractNo = ?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.orgVarContractNo = ?1 and o.statusCode in('D1','D2','P','VR','PA')
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.oldContractNo = ?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where substring(o.contrNo,1,7) = (select max ( substring (a.contrNo,1,7) ) from Proposal a )
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.orgVarContractNo =?1 and o.statusCode ='VC' order by o.proposalId
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.orgVarContractNo = ?1 and o.contractPeriodVarNo = ?2
select object(o) from Proposal o where (o.contrNo = ?1 or o.extContractNo = ?1) and o.statusCode in ('C','EX')
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.submittedBy = ?1
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.approvedBy=?1 and o.statusCode in ('PA','EA','AA','VA') and o.groupName = ?2
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.createdBy = ?1 and o.groupName = ?2 and o.contractStartDate >= ?3 and o.contractEndDate <= ?4
select object(o) from Proposal o where o.createdBy = ?1 and o.groupName = ?2

query.description: This query will find all the roles allowed
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from Role o

query.description: This wil find information by group name
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from UserProfile o where o.groupName = ?1

query.description: This will find information by sales Org
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from UserProfile o where o.assoSalesOrg = ?1

query.description: This method returns all Users for a Particular Role
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from UserProfile o where o.role in (?1, ?2)
select object(o) from UserProfile o where o.assoSalesOrg = ?1 and o.role = ?2
select object(o) from ErrorList o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from ErrorList o where o.messageId = (select max(a.messageId) from ErrorList a)
select object(o) from Sharing o where o.accessTo =?1
select object(o) from Sharing o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from Sharing o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.accessType= 'F'
select object(o) from CustomerList o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from AccessHistory o where o.proposalId = ?1 and o.userId = ?2
select object(o) from AccessHistory o where o.proposalId = ?1
select object(o) from BPCustList o where o.userId = ?1
select object(o) from BPLegacyNo o where o.userId = ?1
select object(o) from GeoSecOff o
select object(o) from GeoSecOff o where o.salesOrg = ?1
select object(o) from GeoSecOff o where o.geoSecOffSo = ?1
select object(o) from Group1 o
select object(o) from Group1 o where o.salesOrg=?1
select object(o) from Group1 o where o.groupName = ?1
select object(o) from UserGroup o where o.userId = ?1
select object(o) from UserGroup o where o.groupName = ?1
select object(o) from BaseAgreement o where o.agreementNumber = ?1 or o.formNumber = ?2 or o.customerNumber = ?3 or o.enterpriseNumber = ?4
select object(o) from BaseAgreement o where o.agreementId = (select max(a.agreementId) from BaseAgreement a)
select object(o) from BaseAgreement o where o.customerNumber = ?1 and o.formNumber = ?2
select object(o) from BaseAgreement o where o.salesOrganization = ?1 and o.formNumber = ?2
select object(o) from BaseAgreementForm o where o.salesOrganization= ?1
select object(o) from BaseAgreementModificationType o where o.salesOrganization= ?1
select object(o) from BaseAgreementModificationType o where o.salesOrganization= ?1 and o.modificationTypeCode= ?2
select object(o) from BaseAgreementModificationDetails o where o.agreementId = ?1
select object(o) from ModificationOptions o where o.modificationTypeCode = ?1
select object(o) from BARole o
select object(o) from UserType o
select object(o) from BaseAgreementChangeLog o where o.agreementId = ?1
select object(o) from BaseAgreementChangeLog o where o.changeId = (select max(a.changeId) from BaseAgreementChangeLog a)
select object(o) from CCType o
select object(o) from MCType o
select object(o) from BLBIndicator o

query.description: This query will find all the actions allowed
query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from ActionDescription o
select object(o) from ActivityLog o
select object(o) from PaymentMethod o
